channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins BART Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins BART Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-45387|2024-08-03T14:09:57.013Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bart%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins BART Plugin 1.0.3 and earlier does not escape the parsed content of build logs before rendering it on the Jenkins UI, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.
